summary: This is an inventory of items collected by law enforcement for case 31E-MM-108062, primarily on August 28, 2006, with additional items collected in April and August 2007. The items, seized from various locations including an office, master bedroom, guest house, and pool area, include massage tables, photos and videos (some depicting nudity), personal lubricant, vibrators, phone message books, flight information, and numerous audio/video recordings, indicating a comprehensive evidence collection effort related to potential sexual abuse and exploitation.

events.title: Primary Evidence Collection
events.description: Law enforcement collected a large number of items as evidence for case 31E-MM-108062, including massage tables, photographs, videos, personal items, documents, and electronic media.

events.title: Additional Evidence Collection
events.description: Collected items including a book titled 'An Invitation to Poetry' and a Victoria's Secret bra and panty set.

events.title: Final Evidence Collection
events.description: Collected one book titled 'Massage For Dummies'.

keyFacts: The inventory lists multiple massage tables (beige, brown, green, peach), suggesting locations used for massages.
Numerous photos and videos were seized, including a 'black framed photo of nude girl', 'framed photos - cabana', and videos from the 'pool area' and 'master bedroom'.
Personal and sexual items were collected, including 'Two vibrators - Twin Torpedo', 'One bottle of Joy Jelly', and 'Victoria's Secret white bra and panties set'.

The seizure includes many recorded conversations and surveillance tapes (e.g., 'Taped conversation', 'VHS tape of surveillance', multiple 'Sony Micro Cassettes'), indicating extensive electronic monitoring or recorded interactions.

Documents referencing flight information, phone messages, and individuals (initials like J.L., A., C.W., D.M.) were collected, pointing to travel records and communications being part of the investigation.
